articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Firing Contest of KPA Artillery Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Firing Contest of KPA Artillery Units
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, watched a firing contest of KPA artillery units.
					 Taking part in the contest were artillery sub-units under KPA Large Combined Units 966, 313, 567, 526, 233, 549, 324, 593 and 287.
					
					 After hearing a report on the procedure and way of a single-gun firing contest, the Supreme Commander watched the contest at an observation post.
					
					 All the contestants hit every target with the perfect marksmanship they acquired in routine drills and thus displayed the will of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to mercilessly wipe out any provokers against the DPRK, a socialist country.
					
					 With a broad smile on his face, Kim Jong Un said that the dependable KPA artillerymen are very good at firing and they seem to be well-trained snipers.
					
					 Noting that the single-gun firing method, applied at the contest, is a very good training method for single-shot hit without trial firing, he underlined the need to positively study new ways, contents and methods of training, as required by modern warfare, and thus improve the effectiveness of drills so as to make a fresh progress in staging drills.
					
					 At the contest the first place was taken by KPA Large Combined Unit 966, the second by Unit 549 and the third by Unit 593. They were followed by Units 287, 313, 324, 567, 233 and 526 in standings.
					
					 Successful units and soldiers were awarded crackshots certificates, medals and badges.
					
					 Then Kim Jong Un advanced important tasks for building up the Juche-based artillery force before KPA commanding officers, executive members of the KPA Party Committee and artillery commanders of the large combined units.
					
					  What is essential in strengthening the artillery force is to raise the firing hit-rate above anything else, he said, urging the KPA to stage a brisk drive for learning from the heroic artillerymen on Mu Islet as part of the crackshots movement.
					
					  He expressed great expectation and belief that the officers and soldiers of all artillery units and sub-units would intensify their drills, as the anti-Japanese guerillas did in Mt. Paektu, under the Party's slogan of training-first to improve the artillery force in a qualitative way and thus contribute to reliably defending the Party and the revolution, the country and its people.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on January 1.
					 The message extended greetings to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea on the New Year 2016.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the new year would be a more wonderful and successful year for the two friendly countries, the message hoped that all the plans of Kim Jong Un for prosperity of the great DPRK would be carried out and wished him happiness and his family wellbeing in the new year.
					
					 It also hoped for the steady cooperation with the Workers' Party of Korea for the wellbeing of the peoples of the two neighboring countries and other progressive people.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Vow to Carry through Tasks Set forth by Kim Jong Un in His New Year Address
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Vow to Carry through Tasks Set forth by Kim Jong Un in His New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square Tuesday to carry through the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam and other senior officials of the party and state, vice-premiers and people from all walks of life in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), said in a report that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as a militant banner arousing all the service personnel and people to the general charge to glorify the 7th Congress of the WPK as one of victors and glory and bring about a new turn on all fronts for building a thriving nation, and maxim of life and struggle to be regarded as guidelines in the on-going general advance.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need for the officials, party members and other people in the capital city of Pyongyang to uphold the militant slogan "Let us usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation in this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held!" and take the lead in the nationwide campaign with ardent loyalty to the Party and extraordinary patriotic zeal, and fully demonstrate the spirit and mettle of Korea that is rushing forward towards final victory racing against time. 
					
					 He called for dynamically advancing to glorify the significant year when the 7th Congress of the WPK will be held as a year of the great victory, full of conviction in sure victory and optimism, true to the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The report was followed by speeches of Jon Chang Guk, manager of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, on behalf of the working class, Ho Chun Gum, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Kumdae Cooperative Farm of Rakrang District, on behalf of agricultural workers, Mun Chol, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the youth league, on behalf of youth and Mun Kwang Il, dean of a faculty of Kim Chaek University of Technology, on behalf of intellectuals.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged demonstrations.

articles.title: Medals Awarded to Products of Sonhung Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Medals Awarded to Products of Sonhung Foodstuff Factory
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Products of the Sonhung Foodstuff Factory were awarded the December 15 medals for quality some days ago.
					 Among them are fruit-jam breads, cookie, coffee candy and jellies.
					
					 All products of the factory have been highly appreciated by customers for their peculiar taste, high quality and supplementary medical effects.
					
					 The medal for quality was instituted for the best home products in the DPRK.

articles.title: Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through South Hwanghae Province
 Haeju, January 5 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of young vanguard passed through South Hwanghae Province.
					 They arrived in Jaeryong County of the province on Dec. 29 last year.
					
					 They were greeted by Pak Yong Ho, chief secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Jong Ryong, chairman of the South Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The red flag was handed over to members of the relay group of the province in Samjigang-ri, Jaeryong County.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets and made bows before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Haeju City and the mosaics depicting their beaming images in significant places.
					
					 They joined young vanguard in the province in holding an oath-taking meeting.
					
					 They toured various places in the province including Jaeryong Mine and Oguk-ri of Anhak County.
					
					 They visited the Sinchon Museum and held a meeting to pledge revenge.
					
					 They also helped farmers at the township co-op farm of Samchon County in their work.
					
					 They dropped in at the houses of war veterans and disabled soldiers in Haeju City.
					
					 During the journey they held various political and cultural events.

articles.title: Vol. 25 (Enlarged Edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Vol. 25 (Enlarged Edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Vol. 25 (enlarged edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 47 works leader Kim Jong Il authored from February, Juche 99 (2010) to December, Juche 100 (2011).
					
					 Among them are works indicating important tasks to be fulfilled by the entire party and army and all people to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu through generations, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also there are works expounding the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on party building and theory on its leadership art and indicating the tasks and ways for preserving and carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based idea on the women's movement and his exploits, enriching the people's diet and developing culinary culture.
					
					 The book also includes works indicating the tasks to be carried out to train the students as competent scientific and technological talents in the IT age by developing the education in the country and fully demonstrate the advantages and might of the socialist healthcare system by thoroughly implementing the party's healthcare policy.
					
					 Also among them are works to be held fast to by officials, party members and other working people as guidelines for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. War Exercises Targeting North Source of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. War Exercises Targeting North Source of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- War exercises staged by the U.S. in south Korea every year are the root cause of having turned the Korean Peninsula into the biggest hotspot and the hotbed of a nuclear war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation has suffered untold misfortune and pain for a long period and the DPRK-U.S. relations have steadily deteriorated entirely due to the U.S. large-scale aggressive war exercises targeting the DPRK.
					
					 It is the requirement of the times to defuse the danger of a war and ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has so far made a series of crucial proposals on its initiative and made every possible effort to realize them in order to defuse the tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 War exercises staged by the U.S. every year are not for the purpose of drills but aimed to go over to an actual war any time.
					
					 The U.S. saber-rattling always brings suffering and misfortune to the Korean nation, chills the Koreans' desire for reunification and lays obstacles in the way of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The war exercises against the DPRK should be halted unconditionally in order to avert a war on the Korean Peninsula and ensure the world peace. This is the only way of creating peaceful climate on the peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. misjudges the DPRK's patience as a sign of weakness and provokes it even a bit, it will never pardon the U.S. but strongly react against it with a merciless sacred war of justice.

articles.title: Preserving Peace Is Essential for Achieving National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Preserving Peace Is Essential for Achieving National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNAA) -- It is the fundamental condition for achieving the country's reunification to defuse the danger of war and safeguard peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is by no means impossible to create an atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations and peaceful environment on the peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make a bold decision to roll back the policy of confrontation and opt for defusing the tension and creating peaceful climate on the peninsula.
					
					 Only when the south Korean authorities stop the joint military drills against the north in collusion with outside forces, is it possible to defuse the tension and build confidence between the north and the south.
					
					 If they truly want the peace and reunification on the peninsula, they should show their sincerity by halting all war exercises targeting the north, to begin with.
					
					 It is our consistent stand and will to make patient efforts for peace on the peninsula and security in the region. 
					
					 However, we will never allow any slightest acts of challenging our efforts to defuse tension and preserve peace.
					
					 If aggressors and provocateurs dare hurt us even a bit, we will never pardon them but resolutely react against them with a merciless sacred war of justice, a great war for national reunification.
					
					 With no challenge for aggression can the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad block the advance of the Koreans for national reunification.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Basic Factor That Compelled DPRK to Bolster Nuclear Deterrence
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Basic Factor That Compelled DPRK to Bolster Nuclear Deterrence
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the U.S. had already worked out a nuclear bombing plan targeting major objects and regions of the former socialist countries including major cities of the DPRK back in the mid-1950s.
					 According to a data declassified by the U.S. National Archives, far back in 1956 the U.S. had already set 4,500 objects and regions of the former socialist countries with dense population and where major objects are situated including the former Soviet Union and Democratic Germany as well as more than 10 regions in the DPRK such as Pyongyang, Nampho, Wonsan, Sinuiju, Chongjin, Uiju and Pukchang as targets of nuclear attack and had been hell-bent on producing nuclear weapons for putting the plan into practice.
					
					 This is a proof showing again the U.S. criminal scenario for realizing its ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. is a hideous nuclear criminal nation that has constantly posed nuclear blackmail for more than 70 years, seriously endangering mankind.
					
					 In August 1945 the U.S. dropped A-bombs in Hiroshima and Nagasaki of Japan, turning the two cities into heaps of debris and annihilating hundreds of thousands of citizens.
					
					 In March 1954 it carried out H-bomb test in waters off Bikini Island of Marshal Archipelago in the Pacific Ocean, destroying the living habitat of the inhabitants and showering a Japanese fishing boat with lethal radioactive fallouts.
					
					 The U.S. also spurred nuclear modernization along with the deployment of nuclear weapons in major strategic points of the world including Asia and Europe, further increasing the nuclear threats.
					
					 In October last year, it carried out the performance test of B61-12, new-type nuclear bomb, for the purpose of replacing the old nuclear bombs that had been deployed in Europe with modern ones.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threats aimed at world supremacy have culminated in its nuclear blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 Loudly crying out for forming a radioactive belt in the northern area of the Korean Peninsula during the Korean war, the U.S. held 22 confabs from 1952 to 1953 and even carried out the exercises of dropping A-bombs. After the war the U.S. kept itself all the more frantic to stifle the DPRK with nuclear weapons as a basic means.
					
					 Through the ceaseless introduction of nuclear weapons into south Korea, the U.S. turned it into the biggest nuclear arsenal and nuclear outpost in the Far East region.
					
					 In January 1968 when its armed spy-ship Pueblo was captured by sailors of the Korean People's Army and in April 1969 when its large spy plane EC-121 was shot down, the U.S. openly called for nuclear strike at the DPRK, rendering the situation extremely tense.
					
					 It even worked out a war document specifying the use of a nuclear weapon against the DPRK in case of "contingency" after including the DPRK in the list of preemptive nuclear attack in the "nuclear posture review" in March 2002.
					
					 It has staged Freedom Bolt, Team Spirit, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle, Ulji Freedom Guardian and other frantic DPRK-targeted nuclear war exercises century after century.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises which it staged with the south Korean authorities in August last year by applying OPLAN 5015, a plan for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, after final agreement with them, creating a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief culprit of nuclear blackmail and nuclear war as it dropped the first A-bomb over the head of humankind and brandishes at will a nuclear stick to realize its ambition for world domination.
					
					 Only the danger of a nuclear war will increase when a party in hostile relations with the other non-nuclear party is the world's biggest nuclear power and nuclear war fanatic.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK had an access to nuclear weapons and codified it and has steadily bolstered them under the new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in order to repel the U.S. nuclear blackmail.
					
					 The U.S. increased nuclear threats are a basic factor that compelled the DPRK into bolstering a nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. had better face up to the situation and stop at once the foolish moves for provoking a nuclear war.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Keen on Hysteria for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Keen on Hysteria for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military warmongers are getting hell-bent on the confrontation with the DPRK, reeking off powder smell from the beginning of the year.
					 On January 1 the Sixth Corps staged maneuvers for attacking the DPRK at a training ground in Phochon, Kyonggi Province, with tanks, armored cars, automatic artillery pieces and other mobile strike means involved.
					
					 The Aerial Operation Command of the Army and the 11th Motorized Infantry Division fired shells at a firing range in Yangphyong, Kyonggi Province on the same day with helicopters, tanks and armored cars involved.
					
					 Military bosses are kicking up rackets for confrontation with the DPRK at the forefront areas.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Demand Japan's Sincere Apology for Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Demand Japan's Sincere Apology for Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Christian Presbyterian Church of south Korea in a commentary on December 30 last year urged Japan to make sincere apology for its past crimes related to sexual slavery, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 Humiliating is the results of the recent talks with Japan in which it refused acknowledgement of legal responsibility for its past crimes, the commentary said.
					
					 It demanded the prime minister of Japan admit its aggression and occupation of Korea and beg a pardon of the victims of the sexual slavery through his honest apology.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Vow to Usher in Fresh Heyday in Movement of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Vow to Usher in Fresh Heyday in Movement of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) renewed their pledges to usher in a fresh heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan after receiving Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and congratulatory message.
					 Kim Song Hun, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and congratulatory message serve as a treasured sword for victory and inspiring banner for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to launch an offensive together with the people in the homeland all out in the general advance toward the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, noted that the league would take the lead in the advance for fully demonstrating before the whole world the might of Chongryon grown under the loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, keeping pace with the young people in the homeland creating legendary tales about heroic young people.
					
					 Jang Pyong Thae, rector of Korean University, stressed that the university would direct main efforts to implanting patriotism and national identity into the minds of the students by thoroughly establishing Juche in national education and improve educational contents and methods as required by the age of knowledge-based economy and thus fulfill its mission and duty in fully demonstrating the advantages and vitality of the national education.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Matchless Grit Lauded by Iranian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Matchless Grit Lauded by Iranian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Iranian newspaper Iran News carried a special write-up on Dec. 30, the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 It said in an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Un possessed of matchless grit" illustrated with his photo:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, is the leader possessed of the grit startling the world.
					
					 The DPRK's launch of its first working satellite in December, 2012 marked an important occasion in demonstrating his grit.
					
					 When the U.S. instigated the UNSC to finally adopt a new "resolution" finding fault with the DPRK's satellite launch and laid bare its scenario to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK, it conducted the third underground nuclear test in Feb. 2013.
					
					 In order to cope with the U.S. extreme moves for aggression, Kim Jong Un convened an emergency operation meeting on the firepower strike mission of the KPA Strategic Rocket Force and finally ratified the firepower strike plan for putting the U.S. mainland, Hawaii, Guam and even the military bases in the Pacific operational theatre within the range of strike. 
					
					 This stunned the world. No country has ever opened to public its plan to strike even the mainland of the U.S., "the world's only superpower", which has invaded other countries and resorted to high-handed and arbitrary practices for centuries. 
					
					 It is quite clear that the DPRK is sure to triumph thanks to its matchless armed forces and Kim Jong Un possessed of rare grit if a war breaks out between the DPRK and the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign media posted special write-ups interwoven with articles on their websites on the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The British newspaper The New Worker on December 18 last year carried an article written by Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article recalled that after the sudden demise of President Kim Il Sung Kim Jong Il creditably carried forward the idea and cause of the President, turning the DPRK into a socialist power. 
					
					 An article illustrated with his photo was posted on Irkutsk Blog Spot. Ru, the Irkutsk website of Russia, on December 21 last year.
					
					 The article said that the international community has watched the most prominent supreme commander over the past period, praising the Songun leadership exploits he has performed by bolstering up the military muscle as firm as a rock and firmly defending the security of the country and its people and peace and stability in the region.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper The Daily Folk on December 23 last year in an article titled "Father of soldiers" highly praised him for showing loving care for them as their real father would do, regarding it his noble duty as supreme commander to take care of them and lead them.

articles.title: DPRK's Constitution Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Constitution Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The socialist constitution of the DPRK is the most progressive and democratic one in the world.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on December 27 last year on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of the promulgation of "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The socialist constitution of the DPRK reflects the idea of the President on believing in the people as in heaven. It is based on the Juche idea founded by him.
					
					 Today the Korean people call it Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il constitution.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is displaying the its tremendous vitality in the new century, too, and the Korean people have achieved great successes in building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The constitution serves as pride of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de tiro de canon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de tiro de canon
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio la competencia de tiro de canon.
					En la ocasion participaron las subunidades de artilleria, adscritas a las grandes unidades combinadas 966, 313, 567, 526, 233, 549, 324, 593 y 287 del EPC.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal escucho un parte sobre el orden y el metodo de la marcha de la competencia de tiro de un canon y vio la competencia.
					
					Los participantes acertaron el blanco dando prueba del arte de canonazo adiestrado en los ejercicios ordinarios, de manera que demostraron la voluntad del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu de aniquilar sin piedad a quienes atentan en lo minimo a la patria socialista.
					
					El Mariscal se mostro muy alegre diciendo que nuestros fidedignos artilleros tiran bien y elogio que le parece que los francotiradores bien ejercitados dan con certeza en el blanco.
					
					Senalo que la competencia de hoy deviene un excelente metodo de ejercicio para acertar el blanco sin disparo de ensayo y destaco que a fin de levantar la revolucion en los ejercicios se necesita mejorar sin cesar la calidad del entrenamiento estudiando activamente nuevos tipos, contenidos y metodos de ejercicios conforme a la demanda de guerra moderna.
					
					En la competencia, la gran unidad combinada 966 del EPC ocupo el primer lugar y las 549 y 593, el segundo y el tercer lugar, respectivamente.
					
					Ademas, les siguieron las grandes unidades combinadas 287, 313, 324, 567, 233 y 526.
					
					Fueron otorgados a las unidades y los artilleros sobresalientes el diploma, la medalla y la insignia de artillero certero.
					
					El Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan para fortalecer las fuerzas de artilleria autoctonas a los miembros de mando del EPC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y los comandantes de artilleria de las grandes unidades combinadas.
					
					Subrayo que el primer, segundo y tercer problema en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas de artilleria es precisamente aumentar el porcentaje de impacto y agrego que el EPC debe desarrollar con energia un movimiento por aprender los artilleros heroicos de la isla Mu en el marco del movimiento por ser artilleros certeros.
					
					Expreso una gran esperanza y conviccion de que bajo la consigna del partido de dar prioridad al entrenamiento, los oficiales y artilleros de todas las unidades y subunidades artilleras deben fortalecer mas en lo cualitativo las fuerzas artilleras al levantar furiosamente el impetu de ejercicios del monte Paektu, de manera que contribuiran activamente a la defensa monolitica al partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.

articles.title: Capitalinos juran materializar tareas presentadas en mensaje del Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Capitalinos juran materializar tareas presentadas en mensaje del Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de los capitalinos para cumplir estrictamente las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					Asistieron al conclave Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, vicepremieres y trabajadores de distintos estratos de esta capital.
					
					El secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil, dijo en su informe que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal sirve de bandera combativa que llama a todos los militares y civiles coreanos a la ofensiva general para hacer del VII Congreso del PTC un evento glorioso de los triunfadores y producir un nuevo cambio en todas las ramas de la construccion de un Estado prospero
					
					Prosiguio que el mensaje en cuestion deviene el lema de la vida y lucha a ser tomado como guia en la marcha general de hoy.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios, militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben poner en pleno manifiesto la fidelidad ardiente al partido y el entusiasmo patriotico extraordinario enarbolando la consigna "!Abramos una epoca de mayor esplendor para la construccion de un Estado poderoso y prospero en este ano en que se celebra el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea!" y estando al frente de todo el pais y demostrar el impetu y coraje de Corea que avanza hacia el triunfo final acortando el tiempo.
					
					 Llamo a todos a luchar con dinamismo por hacer brillar con la invencible confianza y optimismo como ano de gran victoria este ano significativo en que se convocara el Congreso arriba mencionado en pleno acato del mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal.
					
					Luego, pronunciaron discursos de juramento el gerente de la Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang, Jon Chang Guk, la presidenta de la Junta Administrativa de la Granja Cooperativa de Kumdae del capitalino municipio de Rangnang, Ho Chun Gum, el presidente del Comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en la ciudad de Pyongyang, Mun Chol y el decano de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Mun Kwang Il en representacion de los obreros, trabajadores agricolas, jovenes e intelectuales, respectivamente.
					
					Terminado el mitin, tuvo lugar una marcha multitudinaria.

articles.title: Ejercicios belicos de EE.UU. son origen de tension en Peninsula Coreana, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ejercicios belicos de EE.UU. son origen de tension en Peninsula Coreana, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- Los ejercicios belicos que se libran cada ano por Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea han convertido la Peninsula Coreana en una zona mas candente en el mundo y en una fuente de la guerra nuclear.
					Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 5 y prosigue:
					
					Debido a tales ejercicios, la nacion coreana sufre incontables desgracias y dolores y son peores las relaciones entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Estados Unidos.
					
					Es una demanda de la epoca prevenir la peligrosidad de guerra y garantizar la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Hasta la fecha, la RPDC ha hecho todos los esfuerzos posibles presentando con iniciativa varias propuestas importantes en aras de aliviar la tension y preparar un ambiente pacifico en la peninsula.
					
					Los simulacros belicos que se desarrollan anualmente por EE.UU. son para pasar a la guerra real en cualquier momento.
					
					Y acarrean a la nacion coreana las desgracias y dolores constantes, pisotean el anhelo de la nacion por la reunificacion de la patria y ponen obstaculos en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					A fin de prevenir la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y asegurar la paz mundial, deben ser cesados incondicionalmente los ejercicios anti-RPDC., lo que resulta la unica via para preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Pero, si EE.UU. nos toca aunque sea minimo equivocando nuestra paciencia, no lo perdonaremos nunca sino le responderemos tajantemente con la justa guerra sagrada.

articles.title: Amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. empuja a RPDC a consolidar disuasivo nuclear, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. empuja a RPDC a consolidar disuasivo nuclear, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 5 de enero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, se dio a la publicidad que a mediados de la decada de 1950 EE.UU. elaboro el plan de ataque de bombas nucleares contra las ciudades principales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los objetos y zonas importantes de los paises socialistas. 
					Segun datos del archivo nacional estadounidense, ya en 1956 el imperio fijo como blancos de ataque nuclear mas de 10 zonas de la RPDC incluso Pyongyang, Nampho, Wonsan, Sinuiju, Chongjin, Uiju y Pukchang y mas de 4 mil 500 objetos y zonas de los paises socialistas de la poblacion densa como la ex URSS y Alemania Democratica y se entrego a la produccion de armas nucleares para atacarlos. 
					
					El hecho testimonia de nuevo el intento criminal de EE.UU. de tomar la hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Durante mas de 70 anos, este pais criminal nuclear no dejo ni un dia el chantaje nuclear que amenaza gravemente la  subsistencia de la humanidad. 
					
					En agosto de 1945 lanzo bombas nucleares sobre Hiroshima y Nagasaki de Japon, debido a lo cual estas dos ciudades se convirtieron en un santiamen en ruinas y cientos de miles de habitantes quedaron muertos. 
					
					En marzo de 1954 realizo la prueba de bombas de hidrogeno en Bikini de las Islas Marshalles en el Oceano Pacifico destruyendo el terreno de vida de los habitantes locales y acarreo la mortal ceniza radiactiva a un barco pesquero japones.
					
					Acelera el emplazamiento de armas nucleares en los principales puntos estrategicos de Asia, Europa y el resto del mundo y da acicate a la modernizacion de esos armamentos aumentando mas la amenaza nuclear.
					
					En octubre del ano pasado realizo la prueba de funcionamiento de nueva bomba nuclear B61-12 a fin de sustituir las viejas bombas nucleares emplazadas en Europa por las otras modernas. 
					
					La amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. llega al climax con su chantaje nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					En el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana, especificamente, desde 1952 hasta 1953 trazo en 22 ocasiones el complot para formar el corredor radiactivo en la zona septentrional de la Peninsula Coreana y cometio el ejercicio de lanzamiento de bombas atomicas. Y en el tiempo posbelico recurrio con frenesi a la campana de aplastamiento anti-RPDC tomando por medio principal las armas nucleares.
					
					Al introducirlas sucesivamente en el suelo surcoreano, lo convirtio en el mayor arsenal nuclear y base avanzada nuclear. 
					
					En enero de 1968 el barco espia armado norteamericano "Pueblo" fue capturado por los marineros del Ejercito Popular de Corea, y en abril de 1969 fue derribado el avion espia de gran tamano "EC-121". Entonces, EE.UU. agravo extremadamente la situacion insistiendo abiertamente en la necesidad de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					A traves del "informe de disposicion nuclear" publicado en marzo de 2002, incluyo la RPDC en la lista de blancos de ataque preventivo nuclear y elaboro hasta el documento de guerra posibilitando el uso de armas nucleares contra la RPDC en el "tiempo de emergencia".
					
					Desarrolla decada tras decada y siglo tras siglo los fanaticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC como Freedom Bolt, Team Spirit, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle y Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					En particular, en el ano pasado acordaron finalmente con las autoridades surcoreanas el "OPLAN 5015", y en agosto, libro el simulacro militar conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian para aplicar este nuevo guion de guerra cuya meta es asestar el despiadado ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. De esta manera, llevo al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. es el caudillo de chantaje y guerra nucleares que lanzo por primera vez las bombas atomicas sobre la cabeza de humanidad y esgrime el garrote nuclear para tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					En la confrontacion entre una potencia nuclear y maniaco de guerra nuclear y un pais desmilitarizado es inevitable el aumento del peligro de la guerra nuclear.
					
					Es natural que frente al chantaje nuclear la RPDC posea las armas nucleares, legalice el disuasivo nuclear y lo consolide segun la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo.
					
					La creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. es el factor principal que empuja a la RPDC a consolidar el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. debe parar las absurdas maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear viendo correctamente la realidad.
